title: Clear night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a busy city street at night, with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 3.9 m/s). There are 12 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet and there are many other vehicles on the street. The traffic lights are mostly red and there are several pedestrians walking on the sidewalk. The weather is clear and the visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to avoid any accidents due to the wet road and the presence of pedestrians. It is also prepared to brake or change lanes when necessary to maintain a safe distance from other vehicles. The driver is being cautious and attentive to the surroundings to ensure a safe driving experience.
